channel.description: Fresh recipes and cooking inspiration for Pinterest discovery

item.title: Sesame Grilled Salmon
item.description: This Sesame Grilled Salmon is a vibrant, flavorful dish that combines the nutty aroma of sesame with the sweetness of honey and the zing of fresh ginger. Perfectly grilled to flaky perfection, it’s an impressive yet easy main course ideal for a special brunch or weeknight dinner. | ⏱️ Prep: 10min | Cook: 10min | Serves: 2 | #cat1758322525571 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe
item.dc:creator: author_003
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 10 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 10 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 20 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 2

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • ¼ cup light soy sauce
  • 1 ½ tablespoons honey
  • 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger
  • 1 clove garlic, minced
  • 1 pound salmon fillets
  • 1 teaspoon sesame oil
  • 2 teaspoons sesame seeds

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Whisk soy sauce, honey, grated ginger, and minced garlic together in a bowl until the marinade is evenly mixed. Set aside 1/4 of the marinade for later use.
  2. Place salmon fillets in a shallow dish and pour the remaining marinade over them. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 5 minutes to let flavors infuse.
  3. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
  4. Remove salmon from marinade, shaking off excess, and place skin-side up into the hot skillet. Cook for 4 minutes without moving to develop a nice sear.
  5. Discard the marinade left in the dish. Flip the salmon, drizzle the reserved marinade over the fillets, and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
  6. Cook for an additional 5 to 7 minutes until the salmon flakes easily with a fork.
  7. Flip salmon once more, remove the skin, and cook for 1 more minute to finish.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1758322525571 #easyrecipe #quickrecipe #30minutemeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #light #honey #tablespoon

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

media:content.media:description: This Sesame Grilled Salmon is a vibrant, flavorful dish that combines the nutty aroma of sesame with the sweetness of honey and the zing of fresh ginger. Perfectly grilled to flaky perfection, it’s an impressive yet easy main course ideal for a special brunch or weeknight dinner.

item.title: Absolutely Ultimate Potato Soup
item.description: This creamy, comforting potato soup is the perfect hearty meal for chilly days. Rich with smoky bacon, tender potatoes, and a luscious herb-infused cream base, it’s a soul-warming treat that’s easy to make and endlessly satisfying. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 8 | #cat1758062807185 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_003
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound bacon, chopped
  • 2 stalks celery, diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 8 potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 4 cups chicken stock, or enough to cover potatoes
  • 3 tablespoons butter
  • ¼ cup all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 teaspoon dried tarragon
  • 3 teaspoons chopped fresh cilantro
  • Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Place bacon in a Dutch oven and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, 5 to 10 minutes.
  2. Drain bacon pieces on paper towels and reserve 1/4 cup of the bacon grease in the pot; discard the rest.
  3. Cook celery and onion in the reserved bacon drippings until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
  4. Stir in garlic and cook for 1 to 2 minutes until fragrant.
  5. Add cubed potatoes and toss to coat, sautéing for 3 to 4 minutes.
  6. Return bacon to the pot and add enough chicken stock to just cover the potatoes.
  7. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.
  8. Meanwhile, melt butter in a separate skillet over medium heat and whisk in flour.
  9. Cook, stirring constantly, for 1 to 2 minutes to form a roux.
  10. Slowly whisk in heavy cream, dried tarragon, and chopped cilantro.
  11. Bring the cream mixture to a boil and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened, about 5 minutes.
  12. Add the cream mixture to the potato mixture and stir to combine.
  13. Transfer about half of the soup to a blender and purée until smooth, then return to the Dutch oven.
  14. Adjust salt and pepper to taste.
  15. Serve hot, optionally topped with crumbled bacon, green onions, or shredded Cheddar cheese.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1758062807185 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pound #stalks #onion

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound bacon, chopped
  • 2 stalks celery, diced
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 8 potatoes, peeled and cubed
  • 4 cups chicken stock, or enough to cover potatoes
  • 3 tablespoons butter
  • ¼ cup all-purpose flour
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 teaspoon dried tarragon
  • 3 teaspoons chopped fresh cilantro
  • salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Place bacon in a Dutch oven and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, 5 to 10 minutes.
  2. Drain bacon pieces on paper towels and drain off all but 1/4 cup of the bacon grease.
  3. Cook celery and onion in the reserved bacon drippings until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
  4. Stir in garlic and continue cooking for 1 to 2 minutes.
  5. Add cubed potatoes and toss to coat. Sauté for 3 to 4 minutes.
  6. Return bacon to the pan and add enough chicken stock to just cover the potatoes.

  8. Meanwhile, melt butter in a separate skillet over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook, stirring constantly, 1 to 2 minutes.
  9. Whisk in heavy cream, tarragon, and cilantro.
  10. Bring cream mixture to a boil and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened, about 5 minutes.
  11. Add cream mixture to the potato mixture and stir to combine.
  12. Transfer about half of the soup to a blender and purée, then return to the Dutch oven.
  13. Adjust seasonings with salt and pepper to taste.
  14. Serve hot and enjoy!

item.title: Cattle Ranch Casserole
item.description: This cattle ranch casserole is a beefy, cheesy, tomato and chile-rich casserole with a biscuit base. It's perfectly suitable for a family or for a group of hungry ranch hands. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 50min | Serves: 10 | #cat1758062039737 #moyenrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_004
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 50 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 65 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 10

📊 Difficulty: Moyen

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups baking mix, such as Bisquick
  • 1 1/4 cups whole milk
  • 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided
  • 2 pounds lean ground beef
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 poblano peppers, seeded and chopped
  • 1 packet taco seasoning
  • 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
  • 1/2 cup mayonnaise
  • 1/2 cup sour cream, plus more for garnish
  • 2 cups shredded pepper Jack cheese, divided
  • 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
  • 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with Hatch green chiles, drained
  • 1/2 cup chopped cilantro or green onions for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Lightly coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
  2. Stir baking mix, milk, and 1 tablespoon oil together in a bowl. Spread evenly in the prepared baking dish.
  3. Bake in the preheated oven until just starting to turn golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes. This step is just par-baking - this layer will not be fully baked at this point. Remove from the oven and set aside.
  4. Heat remaining tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and cook, stirring occasionally, until almost cooked through, about 4 minutes.
  5. Add onion and poblano, stirring occasionally, until the beef is cooked through and onions begin to soften, about 4 minutes more. Stir in taco seasoning and salt until evenly combined. Remove from heat; set aside.
  6. Add mayonnaise, sour cream, 1 cup pepper Jack cheese, and 1 cup Cheddar cheese to a bowl; stir until well combined.
  7. Spoon beef mixture evenly over par-baked biscuit in the baking dish. Sprinkle drained diced tomatoes evenly over beef. Carefully spoon mayonnaise mixture over beef and tomatoes. Sprinkle evenly with remaining shredded cheese.
  8. Bake, uncovered, until cheese is bubbly and starting to turn golden brown, about 30 minutes.
  9. Let the dish rest for 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with sour cream and cilantro or green onions.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1758062039737 #moyenrecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #baking #whole #vegetable

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

Perfect for meal planning and sharing with friends

item.title: Slow Cooker Cowboy Casserole
item.description: This slow cooker cowboy casserole is a family-friendly, budget-friendly layered casserole of ground beef, sliced potatoes, and Cheddar cheese. It's easy to put together and let the slow cooker do the rest. | ⏱️ Prep: 15min | Cook: 190min | Serves: 4 | #cat1758062039737 #facilerecipe #recipe #cooking #foodie
item.dc:creator: author_003
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 190 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 205 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Facile

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound lean ground beef
  • 1/2 cup chopped onion
  • 2 garlic cloves, pressed
  • 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
  • 1 cup milk
  • 4 cups sliced peeled potatoes
  • 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
  • salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook lean ground beef and onion over medium heat until beef is browned and onion is soft and translucent, 6 to 7 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper.
  2. Stir soup and milk together in a bowl.
  3. Line a slow cooker with a slow cooker bag. Place a layer of potatoes, overlapping as needed, at the bottom of slow cooker. Season with salt and pepper. Top with a layer of ground beef, a layer of soup mixture and 1 cup cheese. Repeat layers with remaining ingredients.
  4. Cook on High until potatoes are fork tender, 3 to 4 hours.

item.title: Homemade Cheddar Biscuits
item.description: These deliciously simple homemade cheddar biscuits easily rival Red Lobster’s cheddar bay biscuits. Baked in only about 20 minutes, they’re a must-try for brunch or dinnertime. | ⏱️ Prep: 20min | Cook: 20min | Serves: 10 | #cat1758322525571 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_004
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 20 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 10

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 and 1/2 cups (313g) all-purpose flour (spooned & leveled), plus more as needed for hands and work surface
  • 1 Tablespoon aluminum-free baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup (8 Tbsp; 113g) unsalted butter, cubed and very cold
  • 1 cup + 2 Tablespoons (270ml) cold buttermilk, divided
  • 2 teaspoons (14g) honey
  • 1 cup (125g) shredded cheddar cheese
  • 2 Tablespoons (28g) unsalted butter, melted
  • 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon dried or fresh chopped parsley

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 425°F (218°C).
  2. Make the biscuits: Place the flour, baking powder, baking soda, garlic powder, and salt together in a large bowl or in a large food processor. Whisk or pulse until combined. Add the cubed butter and cut into the dry ingredients with a pastry cutter or by pulsing several times in the processor. Cut/pulse until coarse crumbs form. If you used a food processor, pour the mixture into a large bowl.
  3. Fold in the shredded cheese. Make a well in the center of the mixture. Pour 1 cup (240ml) buttermilk and drizzle honey on top. Fold everything together with a large spoon or spatula until it begins to come together. Do not overwork the dough. The dough will be shaggy and crumbly with some wet spots.
  4. Pour the dough and any dough crumbles onto a floured work surface and gently bring together with generously floured hands. The dough will become sticky as you bring it together. Have extra flour nearby and use it often to flour your hands and work surface in this step. Using floured hands, flatten into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle as best you can. Fold one side into the center, then the other side on top. Turn the dough horizontally. Gently flatten into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle again. Repeat the folding again. Turn the dough horizontally one more time. Gently flatten into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle. Repeat the folding one last time. Flatten into the final 3/4-inch-thick rectangle.
  5. Cut into 2.5- or 3-inch circles with a biscuit cutter. Re-roll scraps until all the dough is used. You should have about 8–10 biscuits. Arrange in a 10-inch cast iron skillet or close together on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Make sure the biscuits are touching.
  6. Brush the tops with remaining buttermilk. Bake for 18–22 minutes or until tops are golden brown. Remove from the oven.
  7. Make the topping: Mix the topping ingredients together. Generously brush on the warm biscuits, and serve warm.
  8. Cover leftovers tightly and store at room temperature or in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1758322525571 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #allpurpose #tablespoon #teaspoon

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Salisbury Steak Meatballs with Mushroom Gravy
item.description: The meatball version of Salisbury steak! Be prepared to marvel at how incredibly juicy and tender these meatballs are. And that mushroom gravy - wow! | ⏱️ Prep: 30min | Cook: 20min | Serves: 5 | #cat1758322525571 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_004
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 30 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 50 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 5

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 3/4 cup panko breadcrumbs
  • 1/2 onion, peeled
  • 1 lb beef mince (ground beef)
  • 1 garlic clove, minced
  • 1 egg
  • 1 tbsp ketchup
  • 1 beef bouillon cube, crumbled
  • 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 3 tsp dijon mustard OR 2 tsp dry mustard powder
  • 1 tbsp olive oil
  • 2 tbsp / 30g unsalted butter
  • 250 g / 8 oz mushrooms, sliced
  • 1/4 tsp each cooking/kosher salt & pepper
  • 2 garlic cloves, minced
  • 2 cups beef stock, low sodium
  • 1/4 tsp each cooking/kosher salt & pepper
  • 3 tbsp flour (all purpose / plain)
  • 2 tbsp water
  • 2 tsp dijon mustard
  • 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • Mashed potato (or rice or pasta)
  • Parsley, finely chopped (optional)

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Place the breadcrumbs in a large bowl. Using a standard box grater, grate the onion over the panko so it soaks in. Mix through.
  2. Add remaining Meatball ingredients and mix well with your hands until thoroughly combined.
  3. Roll 20 to 22 balls (1 1/2 tablespoons of mixture).
  4. Mix slurry ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
  5. Heat the oil in a large skillet over high heat. Cook meatballs, using tablespoons to roll until browned on the outside but still raw inside. Remove onto a plate and set aside.
  6. Melt butter in the same skillet still on high. Cook mushrooms until they start to soften (~ 2 minutes). Add salt, pepper and the garlic, then cook for a further 2 minutes until the garlic is golden and mushrooms are soft.
  7. Add beef stock, salt, pepper and slurry, then stir to combine.
  8. Once the liquid starts to simmer, add meatballs and any juices pooled on the plate. Adjust heat to medium so it's simmering gently and cook for 5 minutes until gravy is thickened and meatballs are cooked through.
  9. Serve over mash sprinkled with parsley if desired.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1758322525571 #mediumrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #panko #onion #mince

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Red Lobster Shrimp Scampi
item.description: This easy Red Lobster Shrimp Scampi delivers restaurant-quality flavor right at home. It’s perfect for both special occasions and quick weeknight dinners when you want something impressive without the fuss. | ⏱️ Prep: 10min | Cook: 30min | Serves: 4 | #cat1757766030517 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking
item.dc:creator: author_004
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 10 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound shrimp peeled and deveined
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 4 garlic cloves minced
  • 1.5 cups dry white wine
  • Juice of one lime
  • 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
  • 0.5 teaspoon red pepper flakes
  • 6 tablespoons butter
  • 2 tablespoons fresh parsley chopped
  • 0.5 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook shrimp for 2 minutes per side until opaque. Remove shrimp and keep warm.
  2. In the same skillet, add minced garlic and sauté for about 30 seconds, stirring to deglaze the pan. Add additional olive oil if necessary.
  3. Pour in dry white wine and lime juice. Simmer until the liquid reduces by half to concentrate flavors.
  4. Incorporate Italian seasoning and red pepper flakes. Cook for 2 minutes to release the herbs' aroma.
  5. Lower heat and allow the skillet to cool slightly until simmering ceases. Stir in butter until fully melted and emulsified with the sauce.
  6. Return shrimp and accumulated juices to the skillet. Add chopped parsley and Parmesan cheese. Heat gently until warmed through. Serve immediately.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1757766030517 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pound #tablespoon #garlic

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!
